title: Mogador Certified Organic 100% Pure Argan Oil 2 fl. oz (60 mL)
description: Mogador Argan Oil is 100% pure certified organic skin care and hair treatment product. Our Moroccan partner Feminine Coop is certified by ECOCERT and is widely recognized as the best argan oil producer. Mogador Argan Oil is cosmetic grade with no solvents used during the extraction. It is not deodorized. Under the supervision of our company's chemist, Mogador is imported according to a rigorous quality assurance plan, thus ensuring maximum freshness and batch consistency. Mogador is a multi-purpose organic skincare product that is effective in treating acne, psoriasis, eczema, and cold sores, as well as for deep scarring and burns. Mogador is super rich in anti-aging antioxidants and vitamin E. These components make the skin refined, radiant and diminish the appearance of wrinkles. Mogador is rich in Omega-6 and Omega-9, two essential fatty acids for creating prostaglandin, a natural anti-inflammatory, which reduces pain, swelling and inflammation. Mogador is the perfect massage oil to relax tired, tense muscles by stimulating blood circulation. Mogador can also be applied as a nourishing hair-conditioning mask, restoring the natural softness and shine of your hair, relieving dry scalps. Used as a nail treatment, Mogador Argan oil fortifies dry, brittle nails.

title: Professional Salon Hair Steamer with Rolling Floor Stand Base
description: This hair steamer is lightweight and economical, and is loaded with professional functions and features. Premium, stainless-steel coil and 650 watts of heating power produce superb steam vapor. Tank-style, heavy-duty water reservoir (capacity of 32 ounces) for easy filling; simply remove reservoir from top of steamer, unscrew the cap, fill the tank with water, replace the cap and set on top of the steamer. Water is automatically drawn into the high-strength, shatterproof acrylic heating chamber as needed (designed for operation with ordinary tap water; distilled water is not required). Two power levels; use the high setting when beginning treatment for fast, maximum steam production, then use the lower level to maintain a moderate amount of steam for the duration of the treatment. Bonnet hood is made from durable tinted acrylic and is generously sized (12" diameter opening, 10" deep). Located inside the hood is a 17" long diffuser used to provide for even steam distribution throughout. Three vent holes with an adjustable control allow refinement of the steam level. Rolled lip along the lower edge of the hood collects condensate and deposits it into a removable collection jar (included) located at the base of the hood. Height is adjustable from 37" to 49" (measured from the floor to the top of the water reservoir). The hood swivels completely and tilts 90-degrees so it can be positioned as desired, accommodating all types of chairs. Easy-rolling casters/wheels allow smooth mobility. Thermal overload circuitry to turn off steamer if water level drops too low, however never allow any steamer to run dry or be operated while unattended. Includes complete hair steamer, grounded power cord (120 volt use only), reservoir, 26" diameter rolling base and instructions. Minor assembly required.

title: Zote Laundry Soap Bar Pink 14.1 Oz (4 Pack)
